about_the_game:
Play as Miley as she goes on her first date in years, but her partner might not be who she expected after she inputted her own details incorrectly it leads to an unexpected date between two usually heterosexual women.

Additional Content


This DLC pack adds the full directors cut content to the game, including extended adult scenes, bonus image illustrations and new content otherwise not featured in the main game. Primarily this includes extended romance and intimate scenes between the characters during the various endings to the game.

Adult Only content included.

content_descriptors.notes:
This pack adds additional content to the game, including full yuri/lesbian sex scenes between two consenting adults. 

All characters included in this game are at least 18 years of age or older.
